mapper.sql: SID, 'NAME', OPER, CORPID, CREATETIME, FLAG, SORT, CHECKFLAG
mapper.insert: insert into db_status (SID, 'NAME', OPER, CORPID, CREATETIME, FLAG, SORT, CHECKFLAG) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update db_status
'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHECKFLAG = #{checkflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
